title: Chinese AI startup DeepSeek launches enhanced V3 AI model with China-made chip support and faster speeds
description: Chinese artificial intelligence startup DeepSeek has rolled out an upgraded version of its flagship model, underscoring the country’s broader effort to cut reliance on U.S. technology. The new release, called DeepSeek-V3.1, adds support for China-made chips and promises faster processing speeds. While DeepSeek’s upgrade, shared in a WeChat post that isn’t publicly accessible, Reuters confirmed

title: Improving prediction of worsening knee osteoarthritis with an AI-assisted model
description: An artificial intelligence (AI)-assisted model that combines a patient's MRI, biochemical, and clinical information shows preliminary promise in improving predictions of whether their knee osteoarthritis may soon worsen. Ting Wang of Chongqing Medical University, China, and colleagues have published this model in the journal PLOS Medicine.

title: AI Is Accelerating the Fourth Turning’s Institutional Meltdown
description: Learn how AI (Artificial Intelligence) is transforming our world amidst crisis, from exciting innovations to serious societal implications.
content: News headlines are focused on AI innovations. Not so much on the input, but on the output. The good, the bad, and the ridiculously ugly parts. It’s mostly entertainment. They want the spectacle—the robot that will fold their laundry, do the dishes, a... [26556 chars]

title: Google to offer Gemini AI to U.S. government agencies for 47 cents
description: The U.S. government struck a deal with Google to use its artificial intelligence and other applications for 47 cents, underbidding other AI partners.
content: The Google brand logo hangs above the entrance to the Google Building, formerly known as Union Inland Terminal in January of 2023. Google's parent company Alphabet made a deal Thursday with the U.S. government to use its Gemini AI. File Photo by John... [2569 chars]

title: Anthropic in Talks to Raise Up to $10 Billion in New Funding
description: Anthropic is nearing a deal to raise as much as $10 billion in a new round of funding, according to people familiar with the matter, a higher than expected sum and one of the largest megarounds to date for an artificial intelligence startup.

title: AI could stop hotels and restaurants wasting food, energy and talent-yet adoption remains low
description: Artificial intelligence could slash waste, cut carbon emissions and ease staff burnout in the hospitality sector—yet many operators are barely scratching the surface, according to new research from the University of Surrey.

title: Tech giants prepare to challenge state AI regulations
description: Tech companies including OpenAI, Meta Platforms Inc. and Alphabet Inc.'s Google are revving up to block US states from regulating their fast-moving and lucrative artificial intelligence businesses.
